services.title: Our Facilities and Schemes
services.subtitle: Comprehensive financial solutions designed with your needs in mind

shareCertificates.title: Pragathi Share Certificates
shareCertificates.description: Invest smartly with us and enjoy dividends of up to 18%! Each share is valued at just ₹100, making it an accessible and rewarding opportunity. With safe investments and transparent terms, your trust and growth are always our priority.

loans.title: Loan Services
loans.description: Property, vehicle, and gold loans with transparent terms and competitive rates.

schemes.title: Special Schemes
schemes.description: Pigmy deposits and recurring schemes designed for your convenience.

joinFamily.title: Join Our Growing Family
joinFamily.subtitle: Manage your finances with ease and confidence.

DirectorsPage.title: Board of Directors
DirectorsPage.subtitle: Meet the dedicated leaders guiding our cooperative towards excellence and community service.

leadershipMessage.title: A Message from Our Leadership
leadershipMessage.content: At Pragathi Co-operative Society, we believe that true success is measured not in numbers alone, but in the lives we touch and the dreams we help fulfill. Our board is committed to upholding the highest standards of transparency, integrity, and service. Together, we work to ensure that every member of our community has access to fair, reliable, and compassionate financial support.
